column4: Microsoft denies auditing partner KPMG's anti-piracy work in India
column5: NEW DELHI Microsoft Corp is not auditing how its partner KPMG cracks down on illegal use of Microsoft software in India  the companies said in a joint statement on Tuesday.

column4: Microsoft denies auditing partner KPMG's anti-piracy work in India
column5: NEW DELHI  April 24 Microsoft Corp is not auditing how its partner KPMG cracks down on illegal use of Microsoft software in India  the companies said in a joint statement on Tuesday.
